about_the_game:
Army Troop is a old-school PvP world war 2 online multiplayer FPS shooter game for everyone with stunning next generation graphics and captivating gameplay.
Select your unique soldier (Infantry, Recon, Tank Crew, Paratrooper...) and weapons from tons of different soldiers and weapons of different WW2 classes and styles (Assault, SMG, Sniper, Shotgun, Pistol, Grenades, LMG, Heavy Machine Guns, Grenade Launcher,....) each one with special combat properties. Customize your own and unique class pearks (Recoil Reducer, Fast Aim...), weapon skin and accessoires (Sight Scope, Silencer....) and jump into the battlefield. Enter the fight and engage in intense team online PvP combat against other players around the world on a variety of great WW2 maps.
Play with or against your friends in both online or private team death match or free for all modes.
The controls are intuitive and super easy to master with sweet user interface.
Army Troop is an actively developed shooter game, new maps, weapons, equipments ,pearks, characters and skins appear regularly in the game updates, as well as more game modes under development. The developers are improving the game optimization and matchmaking system with each new update, providing the best possible gaming experience for WW2 FPS multiplayer shooter fans.



Our game supports a very advanced Bots system, so if there are no enough real players online to join the match, the game will connect advanced bots that react exactly like real players to keep each match with exact 5 vs 5 players, they join the match with custom names, they can choose custom classes with equipments, custom soldiers, they can run, shoot, aim, crouch, prone, jump, dodge, hide, camp anything real players can do, so this game will never die even if there are no players online at all, the game still fun to play against an extremely intelligent bots.
The game has a private match option to play only with your Steam friends, you have option to allow bots to join private match if you want to. Or you can even play solo against bots only, so real players can't join you.
